title: contrib/benchmark libraries are not packaged in 2.1.0 release
description: The lib directory for contrib/benchmark is not included in the 2.1.0 release.  All libraries used are Apache libraries so I think they should be fine for inclusion.

comments.content:
I believe this was fixed by LUCENE-804, but only for source dist, not for binary dist.

Do you think it should be also included in the binary dist?
Since common-build.xml and contrib's build.xml files are not included, not sure these jars would be useful with the binary dist. 

Doron
comments.author: Doron Cohen
